summary: This bill, H.R. 2916, authorizes, ratifies, and confirms the Agreement of Settlement and Compromise to Resolve the Akwesasne Mohawk Land Claim in New York. It details the authorization and confirmation of the settlement agreement, specifically mentioning involved parties such as the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe and the State of New York. The bill also specifies that certain lands owned by the Saint Regis Mohawk Tribe within settlement acquisition areas are considered Indian Country.
